borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook , sunlight and daylight to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to: <br></p><ul><li>Paragraph 130 of National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (September 2023) <br></li><li>Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021); <br></li><li>Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010) <br></li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011) <br></li><li>The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); <br></li><li>Policies&nbsp;DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>

<p style="">The scale, bulk, massing, siting and design especially the use of the flat roof&nbsp;of the proposed double storey extension&nbsp;are considered to be uncharacteristic of the dwellinghouse and harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace and character of the area. The scale of the addition would dominate the rear of the dwellinghouse and the development introduces a discordant roof form to the site.&nbsp; As such, the proposed development is contrary to:<br></p><ul><li style="">Paragraphs&nbsp;130 and 203 of the&nbsp; National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (September 2023) <br></li><li style="">Policies D1, D4, and HC1&nbsp;of the London Plan (March 2021) <br></li><li style="">Policies CP2 and&nbsp;CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<br></li><li style="">Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<br></li><li style="">The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012) <br></li><li style="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4, and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>
description: Construction of an outbuilding and double storey rear extension.
